identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-performance, technical, and emotionally resonant interface for DDNS.LAND that breaks the 'generic SaaS' mold.

typography.installation: Add these fonts via Google Fonts in index.html: Space Grotesk (300-700), Be Vietnam Pro (400-700), JetBrains Mono (400-700).

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Space Grotesk' for all h1-h6. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight: Bold (700) or Light (300) for contrast.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Be Vietnam Pro' for all paragraph text. High legibility.
usage_rules.code: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all DNS records, IP addresses, and API keys.

grid_lines.description: Use subtle background grid patterns to emphasize the technical nature.

buttons.style: Sharp or minimal radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes.

cards.style: Flat with 1px border. No heavy drop shadows in Dark Mode. Use 'inner glow' effect.
cards.padding: p-6 or p-8 for breathing room.

inputs.style: High contrast borders. Focus ring must be sharp (2px).

landing_page.hero: Centered, high-impact text. Background: Abstract Network Nodes (Image 1).
landing_page.features: Bento Grid Layout. Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 blocks.
landing_page.pricing: 3-column grid. Highlight 'Premium' with a glowing border.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation (collapsible on mobile). Main content area with dense data tables.
dashboard.dns_table: Use 'Table' component from Shadcn. Mono font for IPs. Badge for Record Type (A, CNAME).

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with overlay opacity

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio for text. Use APCA for critical elements.
accessibility.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Disable parallax if set.
accessibility.rtl_support: CRITICAL: Interface must support RTL for Persian language. Use logical properties (ms-, me-, ps-, pe-) or Tailwind's rtl: prefix.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Google Fonts links to public/index.html immediately.
2. CLEANUP: Delete App.css. Use only Tailwind classes.
3. SHADCN: Customize the radius in tailwind.config.js to 0.3rem (approx 5px) for a sharper look.
4. RTL: Ensure the 'dir' attribute is dynamically set on the html tag (dir='ltr' or dir='rtl').
5. MOCK DATA: Use realistic DNS data (e.g., 'blog.ddns.land' -> '192.168.1.1').
6. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Simple Icons' (via CDN or svg) for tech logos if needed.
8. THEME: Implement a robust ThemeProvider that handles system preference + user toggle.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text (accessibility nightmare).
Use z-index carefully to create depth.
Micro-interactions on every button (scale-95 on click).
Always use data-testid for interactive elements.
